{{Disambig}}

'''Melon''' may refer to:

==''Minecraft''==
=== Blocks ===
*{{BlockLink|Melon}}, a block grown from melon seeds.
*{{BlockLink|Melon Stem}}, the block that is planted on farmland when melon seeds are used on it.
**{{BlockLink|Attached Melon Stem}}

=== Items ===
*{{ItemLink|Melon Slice}}, a food item obtained by breaking a melon block.
*{{ItemLink|Melon Seeds}}, an item that can be planted on farmland to grow melons.
*{{ItemLink|Glistering Melon Slice}}, a craftable item used in brewing.

=== Feature ===
*{{EnvLink|Pile|Melon Pile}}, a feature that generates only in villages.

== ''Minecraft Earth'' ==
*{{EntityLink|Melon Golem}}, a snow golem with a melon head.
*{{EntityLink|id=melon-seed-projectile|Melon Golem#Melon seed projectile|Melon Seed Projectile}}, a projectile shot by melon golems.

== ''Minecraft  Dungeons'' ==
* {{DuItemLink|melon|Melon Slice|Melon}}, a food item from [[Jungle Awakens]] DLC.
